Protocols/GRPCService.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.name: handleMethod(methodName:vaporRequest:)
Protocols/GRPCService.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.abstract: Returns associated call handler of the service for a procedure call name and the associated Vapor Request.

Protocols/GRPCRequestType.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: vaporRequest
Protocols/GRPCRequestType.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Vapor Request from which the gRPC request was instantiated.

Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.name: ModelType
Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.abstract: Every GRPCMessage is associated to a GRPCModel from the existing code.

Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.name: init(modelObject:)
Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.abstract: Initializes a GRPCMessage using an instance of the associated type.

Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.name: toModel()
Protocols/GRPCMessage.html#/s:9GRPCVapor.abstract: Creates and returns an instance of the associated GRPCModel with the messages attribute values mapped to the model instance.

Protocols/GRPCMessage.html.name: GRPCMessage
Protocols/GRPCMessage.html.abstract: GRPCMessage is a protocol that is implemented by gRPC protocol buffer message structures that are generated by the code generator.

Protocols/GRPCModel.html.name: GRPCModel
Protocols/GRPCModel.html.abstract: GRPCModel is a protocol that is implemented by models in the existing code to declare them ad gRPC messages.

Protocols/GRPCRequestType.html.name: GRPCRequestType
Protocols/GRPCRequestType.html.abstract: GRPCRequestType is a protocol that is implemented by all gRPC request classes and requires attributes used by common default implementations.

Protocols/GRPCService.html.name: GRPCService
Protocols/GRPCService.html.abstract: GRPCService is a protocol that is implemented to declare gRPC services that can contain remote procedure calls.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: vaporRequest
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Vapor Request from which the gRPC request was instantiated. This reference is required by the GRPCRequestType protocol.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: messageStream
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Incoming GRPCStream which type is defined by the class constraint.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: responseStream
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Outgoing GRPCStream which type is defined by the ResponseModel class constraint.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: next
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Promise of the next GRPCStream message that is used to refernce the next message from the current one.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: forEach(onNext:)
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Handles incoming messages from the messageStream by calling the passed closure for each of these messages.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: collect()
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Collects incoming messages from the messageStreamand returns a future with an array of the collected RequestModels.

Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.name: sendResponse(message:)
Classes/GRPCStreamRequest.html#/s:9GRPCV.abstract: Sends a response of type ResponseModel by succeeding the promise of the previous message with the response message value and a promise for the next stream message.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: message
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Single incoming RequestModel value which type is defined by the class constraint.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: vaporRequest
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Vapor Request from which the gRPC request was instantiated. This reference is required by the GRPCRequestType protocol.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: responseStream
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Outgoing GRPCStream which type is defined by the ResponseModel class constraint.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: next
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Promise of the next GRPCStream message that is used to refernce the next message from the current one.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: init(message:vaporRequest:)
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes a GRPCServerStreamRequest with the single incoming RequestModel and associated Vapor Request.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: sendResponse(message:)
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Sends a response of type ResponseModel by succeeding the promise of the previous message with the response message value and a promise for the next stream message.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: sendEnd()
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Ends the response stream by succeeding the promise of the previous message with a stream end message.

Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.name: message
Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.abstract: Single incoming RequestModel value which type is defined by the class constraint.

Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.name: vaporRequest
Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.abstract: Vapor Request from which the gRPC request was instantiated. This reference is required by the GRPCRequestType protocol.

Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.name: init(message:vaporRequest:)
Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.abstract: Initializes a GRPCRequest with the single incoming RequestModel and associated Vapor Request.

Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.name: succeed(value:)
Classes/GRPCRequest.html#/s:9GRPCVapor11.abstract: Creates a succeeded future of a GRPCModel type which is usually the response type on the event loop of the vaporRequest.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: messageStream
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Incoming GRPCStream which type is defined by the class constraint.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: vaporRequest
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Vapor Request from which the gRPC request was instantiated. This reference is required by the GRPCRequestType protocol.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: init(stream:vaporRequest:)
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes a GRPCStream with the single incoming RequestModel and associated Vapor Request.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: forEach(onNext:)
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Handles incoming messages from the messageStream by calling the passed closure for each of these messages.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: collect()
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Collects incoming messages from the messageStreamand returns a future with an array of the collected RequestModels.

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.name: succeed(value:)
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Creates a succeeded future of a GRPCModel type which is usually the response type on the event loop of the vaporRequest.

Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.name: services
Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.abstract: A dictionary containing all used GRPCServices with the service names as their keys.

Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.name: init(services:)
Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.abstract: Initializes a GRPCMiddleware using the GRPCServices passed as an argument.

Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.name: respond(to:chainingTo:)
Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.abstract: Handles to incoming Vapor Requests and responds with an EventLoopFuture of a Vapor Response.

Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.name: getCallHandler(request:)
Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html#/s:9GRPCVapo.abstract: Returns the associated call handler for an incoming Vapor Request.

Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html.name: GRPCMiddleware
Classes/GRPCMiddleware.html.abstract: A GRPCMiddleware instance can be integrated as a middleware into the Vapor application like this:

Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html.name: GRPCClientStreamRequest
Classes/GRPCClientStreamRequest.html.abstract: A GRPCClientStream instance represents a client-streaming gRPC request that provides a forEach method which takes a closure that gets called for each incoming message of the stream, a collect method that returns all incoming messages collected as an array, and a generic succeed method to create a singe response future.

Classes/GRPCRequest.html.name: GRPCRequest
Classes/GRPCRequest.html.abstract: A GRPCRequest instance represents a unary gRPC request that provides the single incoming value and a generic succeed method to create a singe response future.

Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html.name: GRPCServerStreamRequest
Classes/GRPCServerStreamRequest.html.abstract: A GRPCServerStreamRequest instance represents a server-streaming gRPC request that provides the single incoming value and sendResponse and sendEnd methods to send a multiple responses.
